author: James Tanner
method: Place the tortilla in a wide frying pan. Mix all of the remaining ingredients together in a bowl, then place the mixture onto one half of the tortilla. Fold over the tortilla half to cover the filling and place the pan over a medium heat and cook until base of tortilla is golden-brown. Carefully turn over the tortilla and brown other side.  To serve, place onto a warm plate and cut in half to allow the filling to ooze out slightly.
ingredients: 1 ready-made flour tortilla,  ¼ avocado, peeled, stone removed, sliced,  100g/3½oz can mixed beans, rinsed and drained,  2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander,  200g/7oz can cherry tomatoes, drained of juice,  ¼ onion, finely chopped ,  30g/1oz gruyere, grated
